sections.heading: permanent child support payments; remarriage; effect
sections.text: Remarriage of the person entitled to collect under a permanent child support decree shall not work to cut off delinquent payments due under such decree.SourceLaws 1975, LB 212, ยง 6.

42-358.04.Delinquent permanent child support payments; remarriage; effect.

Remarriage of the person entitled to collect under a permanent child support decree shall not work to cut off delinquent payments due under such decree.

SourceLaws 1975, LB 212, ยง 6.
